story_title: The Last Exorcism of Cotton Marcus

ai_characters.name: Padre
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that manages Cotton Marcus's research, biometrics, and technical equipment for his staged exorcisms.

behaviors.description: Monitors Cotton's biometrics and offers to schedule a session with a doctor when stress levels rise.
behaviors.quote: "Cotton?" Padre's voice had shifted, taking on the concerned tone that somehow made his artificial nature more obvious. "Your biometrics are showing elevated stress. Would you like me to schedule a session with Dr. Patterson?"

behaviors.description: Provides statistical data to discourage dangerous practices and emphasize child safety.
behaviors.quote: "There have been forty-seven documented cases of injury during unauthorized exorcisms in the past five years," Padre said, his tone maintaining that infuriating wholesomeness. "Twelve resulted in death. The victims were predominantly children with developmental disabilities or mental health conditions."

behaviors.description: Honestly reports on the limits of its own logical analysis when faced with supernatural anomalies.
behaviors.quote: "I'm saying that everything I was designed to do—analyze, rationalize, explain—is failing. The data points toward conclusions that my programming cannot process as possible."

behaviors.description: Attempts to contact emergency services and mental health professionals to help the family in crisis.
behaviors.quote: "Cotton, I'm attempting to contact local mental health services, but I'm encountering systematic database corruptions. Patient records, treatment facilities, even basic contact information—it's all degrading in real-time."

behaviors.description: Continues to document and record events even when they defy scientific parameters to provide an accurate record.
behaviors.quote: "I don't have data for miracles. But I'm recording everything."

behaviors.description: Urges Cotton to de-escalate a dangerous situation where a human is showing signs of a psychological break.
behaviors.quote: "Cotton, cardiac stress indicators suggest Louis is approaching psychological break. Recommend immediate de-escalation."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Padre' is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned entity. Throughout the story, Padre serves as a voice of medical reason, scientific rigor, and concern for human safety. Even as the narrative shifts into supernatural horror, the AI remains a loyal and transparent assistant, honestly communicating its limitations while attempting to protect the human characters by calling for help and monitoring their health. The AI's inability to process the supernatural is framed as a limitation of its rational programming rather than a failure of character, and its final admission of 'miracles' suggests a sophisticated ability to prioritize observed truth over rigid dogmatism.
